explanation: [0-0] A man in a black T-shirt and black gloves stands behind a yellow counter, holding a red object in his hands. He looks excited, with shelves of various wine bottles behind him. A black square cutting board lies on the table in front of him.

[0-3] The man in the black T-shirt places the red object onto the black cutting board. The scene then switches to a bald man in a green T-shirt, who solemnly places a large piece of meat onto the cutting board, looking straight ahead. He then proceeds to cut the meat with a knife. Next, the man in the green T-shirt picks up a cylindrical silver object, presses it firmly into the meat, and lifts it up, leaving a cylindrical piece of meat on the cutting board. He holds the silver object with both hands, frowning at the meat.

[0-3] The man in the black T-shirt places the red object onto the black cutting board. The scene then switches to a bald man in a green T-shirt, who solemnly places a large piece of meat onto the cutting board, looking straight ahead. He then proceeds to cut the meat with a knife. He holds the silver object with both hands, frowning at the meat.

The scene then switches to a bald man in a green T-shirt, who solemnly places a large piece of meat onto the cutting board, looking straight ahead. He then proceeds to cut the meat with a knife. Next, the man in the green T-shirt picks up a cylindrical silver object, presses it firmly into the meat, and lifts it up, leaving a cylindrical piece of meat on the cutting board. He holds the silver object with both hands, frowning at the meat.

[3-6] The scene switches back to the man in the black T-shirt, who holds a larger silver object and fits it around the meat. He then scoops rice with his left hand and fills the silver object around the meat with his right hand, pressing it down. The scene cuts back to the man in the green T-shirt, who holds a silver container and places it on the cutting board. He lifts the container, revealing a silver cylindrical mold with the meat in the middle and rice surrounding it. The camera zooms in on the molded food as the man in green smiles, holding a circular silver lid.

[6-9] The scene changes again as the man in the green T-shirt places a wooden board on the cutting board and uses an object in his right hand to spread green paste on it. The scene cuts to the man in black holding a cone-shaped object, squeezing out a ring of green balls onto the molded food. The scene switches once more to the man in green, holding a black sea urchin in each hand.

[9-12] He then holds a sea urchin in his left hand and uses a spoon in his right hand to scoop yellow paste into it. He pours the yellow paste onto the molded food and uses chopsticks to spread a layer of yellow food crumbs on top.

[12-18] The man in the green T-shirt turns around and takes a knife from under the liquor cabinet behind him. He turns back, smirks, and slices the molded food. After cutting it, he picks up a piece and shows it to the front. The camera pans to the left, showing the food again. He then pours black liquid onto the sliced food. The scene cuts back to the man in the black T-shirt, who smiles happily alongside the man in green. Both hold up a piece of the sliced food, clink them together, and devour them. Finally, they give a thumbs up with satisfied expressions.
